detail: MongoDB is Document-oriented(JSON) database and NoSQL. Most of my personal projects are built by MongoDB.
I learned from database design to usage in college. I got an A+. I also have a basic knowledge of MySQL.
It is designed for coordinating work among programmers, but it can be used to track changes in any set of files. It was used for all my personal projects.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) provides on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs to companies and individuals. It is very fast and reliable for Web hosting, and is used to deploy my projects.
I learned basic commands in college. I also use it for NPM, Git, and folder and file management in MacOS Terminal and Windows Command Prompt.
This is the first programming language in which I understand data types, functions and classes. I read a 600-page book about C to understand the concept of 'pointer'.

I was a senior computer service technician for five years. I also learned how the networking system works in college. I've been running Network Attached Storage (NAS) at home for seven years, and I know pretty well about these.
